work.name: University of Tübingen
work.summary: Held a weekly exercise session and updated exercise sheets and other material students can use to learn.

work.name: Augustinum
work.summary: Helped in the boarding school of the Samuel-Heinicke-Realschule for hearing impaired people. Supported the students with their home work and organized free time activities. Learned the basics of German Sign Language (DGS) which sparked my interest in languages.

work.name: The Horse Place
work.summary: Worked on the farm of 5-star Parelli instructors Alison and David Zuend and was able to participate in some lectures on Natural Horsemanship.

education.institution: KTH Royal Institute of Technology, Stockholm, Sweden

awards.title: Scholarship: Deutschlandstipendium
awards.summary: Between December 2020 and March 2022 I had a public-private scholarship: 'The Deutschlandstipendium provides financial and non-material support to high-achieving and committed students.'

projects.name: Conjugation Trainer
projects.summary: After my first year of studying I wrote a little program that would help me learn the conjugations of Spanish verbs in all possible tenses.
